information: The company BLUMENGROSSMARKT BERLIN WIRTSCHAFTSGENOSSENSCHAFT EG, is a Wholesaler, founded in 1968, which operates in the Vegetables, edible roots and tubers industry. It also operates in the Fruit, Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry, Cut flowers, and Nurseries industries. It is based in Berlin, Germany.
